intro.title: Intro
intro.body: You are taking a walk in the woods one day when you notice a strange hole in the ground you never noticed before. As you approach the hole, the ground suddenly gives way and you fall into the now enlarged hole. After falling a long way, you land in some extremely cold water and panic takes hold as you as the cold water sweeps you away.

choices.transition: You gasp for breath as you frantically try to find anything to hold onto. The last thing you remember is the feeling of unbearable cold before everything goes black.

choices.body: Close your eyes and accept your fate
choices.transition: As you close your eyes, then water seems to become even more unbearably cold and you quickly and peacefully lose consciousness

awake.title: Awake at Last
awake.body: Suddenly, you snap awake. You notice that you are soaking wet, and partially surrounded by ice. How long has it been, you wonder? You break the remaining ice and as your eyes adjust you notice that you are in a cave.
